data.prayer: Father, move the 13,122 believers in the state of Umbria to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Umbria, Italy
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Umbria access to a Bible in their own language.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 13,122 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Umbria.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Umbria a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 13,122 believers in Umbria and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 13,122 believers in the state of Umbria to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Umbria.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Umbria
location.cities_list: Perugia, Terni, Foligno, Città di Castello, Spoleto
location.cities_list_w_pop: Perugia (120,137), Terni (97,050), Foligno (47,747), Città di Castello (22,497), Spoleto (19,266)
